text: Tadera ke'u ke'u apanara dike kana lagiye thake. Ami tadera antarera upara abarana rekhe diyechi yate eke na bujhe ebam tadera kane bojha bhare diyechi. Yadi tara saba nidarsana abalokana kare tabu'o segulo bisbasa karabe na. Emanaki, tara yakhana apanara kache jhagara karate ase, takhana kapherara baleh eti purbabartidera kicchakahini bai to naya.
